title: runtime error: slice bounds out of range [:273522048] with capacity 496
body:
Hi,

I have my beacon node running for some days. I find some funny errors. I tough I better report. MAybe they are fixed by now. I am runing version 0.27

```
time="2019-12-24 06:22:40" level=error msg="Panic occurred" error="runtime error: slice bounds out of range [:273522048] with capacity 496" prefix=sync topic="/eth2/beacon_block/ssz"
```

Hi @xrow this is a known bug that occurred with some other types of nodes syncing with the wrong configuration with Prysm nodes. This has now been fixed and will no longer be a problem in our upcoming testnet restart this January. Please let us know if this ever happens again.
